item.title: Imdb Top 250 TV Shows
item.description: HUGOMORE42 Web Scraping of an Imdb Web Page ## loading all the packages required: library(rvest) ## Loading required package: xml2 library(splitstackshape) library(tidyr) library(data.table) library(ggplot2) library(scales) Scraping and data preparation for a ranking graph url <- 'https://www.imdb.com/chart/toptv/?ref_=nv_tvv_250' # specifying url of a website to be scraped webpage <- read_html(url) # reading the HTML code from website rank_data_html <- html_nodes(webpage,'.imdbRating , .titleColumn , .velocity') # using css selector to scrap data rank_data <- html_text(rank_data_html) # Converting the ranking data to text head(rank_data) # check how data looks ## [1] "\n 1.

item.title: AutoML
